title: Not a part of my own club?
body:
Since clubs were taking down and put back up I am no longer part of my own club.
All my friends have their tags back and the club chat at the bottom of their clients.
However when I open the clubs window at the bottom of my client I see that I am a part of 0/3 clubs.
I've looked at my friends clients and I am listed in the club chat but I am showing offline even if I am logged in. 
I cant just rejoin the club because I am the leader so nobody can kick me and I do not have the option to quit it myself.
Has anybody else had this issue? Can it on my end or is it an issue with my actual account.

Thanks!

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  There's been some club problems when it restored after some [downtime](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016), and our clubs team has been working on a resolution.  Hang tight and it should be fixed up!

Im having this same issue for a few days now as well.  I am unable to see the club I started, cannot participate in club chat, cannot use my club tag, etc.  My clubmates can see me still in the club, but for them it doesnt show me online in the club interface.  Is this something with a fix or ETA?
Same problem here. Reported it to the support team several times but haven't heard anything back from them yet.
Yeah exactly the same for me, been ages too and in both clients, all my mates are still in the club (RETCH) #best tag but i have nothing yet i started the club
Same issue here. I was hoping it would be fixed after that club issue but I still am not part of my own club and it's really bumming me out
I'm having this problem right now, and it's greatly annoying, all I want to do is rock my tag.
